TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewLinkColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 表示儲存格的資料行，其包含 控制項中的連結。

span.span: Represents a column of cells that contain links in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的類別用來以邏輯方式裝載儲存格會回應使用者點選動作。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that respond to user clicks. 類別是類似於類別但可提供不同的使用者體驗，可能更適合在某些情況下，例如顯示儲存在資料庫資料表中的 URL。The class is similar to the class but provides a different user experience that may be more appropriate in certain situations, such as displaying a URL stored in a database table. 若要顯示每個資料格的相同連結文字，請設定屬性，以`true`並設定感興趣的連結文字的屬性。To display the same link text for every cell, set the property to `true` and set the property to the desired link text. A都有相關聯中每個，與它有交集。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 此資料行類型的預設排序模式是。The default sort mode for this column type is . 若要回應使用者連結按一下，處理事件。To respond to user link clicks, handle the event. 您也可以使用事件以回應任何位置中儲存格的按一下動作。You can also use the event to respond to clicks anywhere in the cell. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例上設定屬性。The following code example sets properties on a . 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

span.para: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 取得或設定在資料行的儲存格內顯示作用中連結所用的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link within cells in the column.

value.span: ，表示用來顯示所選連結的色彩。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.

value.span: 預設值為使用者在 Internet Explorer 中對停留狀態中的連結色彩的設定。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化屬性，因此，連結轉變白色當使用者選取它。The following code example initializes the property so that the link turns white when the user selects it. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

summary.span: 取得或設定用來建立新儲存格的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: ，做為資料欄中所有其他儲存格的模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.

value.span: 預設值是新的 執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式類別初始化這個屬性，以新建。The constructor for the class initializes this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 變更儲存格範本的內容不會立即影響資料行的現有儲存格的使用者的介面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 這些變更才很明顯之後會重新產生資料行, (例如，藉由排序資料行，或透過呼叫方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用做為範本。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 對資料行中的任何資料格的樣式變更會影響所有資料行的資料格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的屬性複製到新的儲存格，並請務必也將複製的任何已新增至衍生類別的屬性值。

When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化這個屬性，以，可讓作業系統選擇連結的顯示方式。The following code example initializes this property to , which lets the operating system choose how the link will display. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示文字，如果屬性設定為`true`。The text is visible if the property is set to `true`. 否則，每個儲存格的連結文字中會填入每個資料格的屬性。Otherwise, each cell's link text is populated with the property of each cell. 您可以覆寫藉由設定儲存格的個別資料格的屬性值屬性設`false`之後設定資料行屬性設`true`。You can override the property value for individual cells by setting the cell property to `false` after setting the column property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當為 true，屬性值用來顯示已瀏覽的連結。When is true, the property value is used to display links that have already been visited. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化此屬性，以便選取時，連結會變更色彩。The following code example initializes this property so that the link changes color when it is selected. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定這個屬性使屬性，請在每個資料格，在本例中的員工識別碼的員工的上司，會顯示為 [文字] 連結。The following code example demonstrates how to set this property so that the property of each cell, in this case the employee ID of the employee's boss, is displayed as the text link. 選取連結之後, 選取點移至老闆的名稱。After selecting the link, the selection point is moved to the boss's name. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設為 false，屬性會被忽略。If the property is set to false, the property is ignored. 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the object returned by the property. 設定這個屬性也設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會初始化此屬性，以便連結是黃-綠色，如果使用者已瀏覽。The following code example initializes this property so that the link is yellow-green if the user has visited it. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic.
